Hi all I‚Äôm new to this group  does anyone know about the ocbc360 savings account? 1 of the requirement to have higher % is to have increment of $500 every month. Does it include the interest that we are given?E.g if I have $10 000 and credit my salary  next month I got $10 040 in my bank account from the interest. Do I need to save $500 or $460?
Just to share. I called up HSBC to check on my bonus points and realized charges to clinic not included for 9x bonus points.Also for bank balance  they charge a fall below fee of $5 per month.

$500 increase in average daily balance (regardless of source). Need to sum up end of day balance for everyday in the month and divide by number of days in the month and ensure it is $500 higher than last month's average daily balance
This question mentioned multiple times. Search chat history will help.
Okay understood  thank you very much
u need to read up on the list of MCC for online/contactless eligible for 10x points

Important message:Read the term and condition(TnC) of the credit card you plan to gain rewards/cashback/mile yourself n fully understand it. It will be you  as the card holder  who may loss of the rewards if you did not understand n meet the criteria/condition  but not other members in this group.
